Arcane.Dragon: Summons an ancient force that scorches enemies with {debuffimg} {lightning}, freezes them with {debuffimg} {ice}, and curses them with {debuffimg} {dark magic} and {debuffimg} {poison}. This elemental dragon ravages the battlefield, leaving trails of smoldering flames, brittle ice, and toxic curses in its wake, instilling fear in all who stand before it.
Arcane.Wild King: Channels primal strength, granting allies {buffimg} {rage} and {buffimg} {endurance}, while enemies suffer from {debuffimg} {poison}. This feral power enhances natural instincts, imbuing allies with unstoppable might and resilience, while weakening enemy resolve through relentless toxin-laced strikes.
Arcane.Fire Gloves: Ignites your fists in blazing heat, delivering {debuffimg} {fire} damage with every strike. The burning energy courses through your hands, searing armor and flesh alike, and turning every punch into an explosion of molten fury that can melt through even the strongest defenses.
Arcane.Lightning Ghost: Unleashes spectral energy, bolstering allies with {buffimg} {endurance} and electrocuting enemies with {debuffimg} {lightning}. This ghostly surge cloaks the battlefield in electrical chaos, empowering friends with supernatural stamina while discharging lethal volts into nearby foes.
Arcane.Meteor: Calls down a celestial inferno, burning foes with {debuffimg} {fire} and {debuffimg} {lightning}, while fueling your fury with {buffimg} {rage}. The impact leaves scorched craters and storms of static energy, feeding your inner blaze and setting the world ablaze around you.
Arcane.Night Unicorn: A mythical charge afflicts enemies with {debuffimg} {dark magic} and {debuffimg} {poison}, while empowering you with {buffimg} {rage}. Cloaked in midnight light, this divine beast tramples foes in cursed venom while its aura surges through you, awakening unstoppable rage.
Arcane.Frost Bomb: Detonates a chilling burst, soaking enemies in {debuffimg} {water}, freezing them with {debuffimg} {ice}, and cursing them with {debuffimg} {curse}. The icy detonation suspends time as enemies are drowned, frozen, and haunted simultaneously, unable to react before shattering under pressure.
Arcane.Cursed Raven: A spectral raven blesses allies with {buffimg} {rage}, {buffimg} {dopamine}, and {buffimg} {curse}, while hexing foes with intense {debuffimg} {curse}. The raven’s flight whispers arcane madness, invigorating allies with fierce clarity while condemning enemies to suffer their own shadowy thoughts.
Arcane.Crying Star: A fallen star weeps elemental sorrow, striking enemies with {debuffimg} {fire}, {debuffimg} {lightning}, and {debuffimg} {ice}, while enlightening allies with {buffimg} {wisdom}. Its tears bathe the battlefield in celestial agony and insight, igniting the mind and scorching the soul.
Arcane.Underground Army: Rises from the depths, charging enemies with {debuffimg} {lightning} while fortifying allies with {buffimg} {endurance} and {buffimg} {rage}. Echoes of forgotten warriors surge forward, electrifying foes and forming an unbreakable wall of power behind you.
Arcane.Freezing Water: Drenches foes in elemental torment with {debuffimg} {water}, {debuffimg} {ice}, and jolts of {debuffimg} {lightning}. This chilling torrent cascades in unrelenting waves, paralyzing limbs, numbing senses, and disrupting magical channels all at once.
Arcane.Poisonous Mist: Spreads a toxic cloud that corrupts enemies with {debuffimg} {poison} and {debuffimg} {curse}. The mist slithers through armor and lungs, silently wrapping enemies in creeping rot and binding them to lingering magical doom.
Arcane.Imperial Touch: A refined gesture heals the soul with {buffimg} {vitals}, {buffimg} {dopamine}, and {buffimg} {wisdom}. This royal blessing revitalizes spirit and mind, filling allies with unmatched clarity, energy, and internal balance.
Arcane.Mana Drain: Siphons arcane forces, empowering with {buffimg} {lightning} while weakening foes through {debuffimg} {dark magic}. The stolen energy surges into you like a tempest, while enemies reel from the sudden collapse of their magical core.
Arcane.Soundless Cast: Silently casts a double-elemental strike with {debuffimg} {water} and {debuffimg} {lightning}. Without uttering a word, you unleash hidden forces that ripple across the field, drenching and electrocuting enemies in a single swift motion.
Arcane.Magic Shield: Forms a barrier of pure energy, shielding allies with {buffimg} {barrier}. The glowing shield bends magic and blade alike, forming a sanctuary in chaos and deflecting even the most fearsome strikes with arcane grace.
Arcane.Fast Learn: Accelerates the mind, granting {buffimg} {wisdom} and a spark of {buffimg} {rage}. This sudden brilliance lets you adapt on the fly, blending insight and instinct in equal measure, creating explosive tactical advantages.
Arcane.Mana Flow: Channels minor arcane disruption, affecting enemies with {debuffimg} {dark magic}. The subtle ripple of unstable magic interferes with enemy casting, leaving their spells frayed and minds clouded by creeping shadows.

Nature.Ruined Sun: Unleashes the decaying wrath of the forest sun, searing enemies with {debuffimg} {fire} and electrifying them with {debuffimg} {lightning}. Also curses their souls with {debuffimg} {curse} and infuses them with dark decay via {debuffimg} {dark magic}.
Nature.Nature Call: Summons the primal force of the earth to empower allies with {buffimg} {rage}, {buffimg} {endurance}, and {buffimg} {vitals}. This rallying cry awakens the spirit of ancient trees and beasts.
Nature.Typhoon: A wild storm is conjured, lashing enemies with {debuffimg} {ice} and {debuffimg} {water}, while granting the caster {buffimg} {dopamine} through elemental exhilaration.
Nature.Snow Shuriken: Hurls razor-sharp snowflakes imbued with {debuffimg} {ice} and {debuffimg} {lightning}, slicing enemies with freezing precision.
Nature.Lightning Bees: A swarm of electrically charged bees attacks, dealing {debuffimg} {lightning} to foes while energizing the caster with {buffimg} {rage} and {buffimg} {endurance}.
Nature.Poisonous Mist: A cloud of venomous fog rolls in, weakening enemies with {debuffimg} {poison}, {debuffimg} {curse}, and {debuffimg} {dark magic}. Inhalation is perilous.
Nature.Thunder Strike: A bolt of lightning crashes down, burning enemies with {debuffimg} {fire} and {debuffimg} {lightning}. The caster is invigorated by the storm with {buffimg} {dopamine}.
Nature.Water Slash: A blade of flowing water slashes enemies, chilling them with {debuffimg} {ice}, shocking them with {debuffimg} {lightning}, and soaking them with {debuffimg} {water}.
Nature.Dirt Golem: Summons a sturdy earthen construct to fight by your side. Though silent, its fists speak loudly through raw strength and loyalty to nature.
Nature.Fast Healing: Nature’s grace mends your wounds, restoring {buffimg} {vitals} and granting {buffimg} {vamp} to leech life with every pulse of energy.
Nature.Magma Ground: Ignites the battlefield beneath enemy feet with {debuffimg} {fire} and {debuffimg} {lightning}. The earth boils with elemental vengeance.
Nature.Poison Touch: A tainted strike imbued with {debuffimg} {poison} and {debuffimg} {curse} corrupts the target with each contact, spreading decay like wildfire.
Nature.Wild Friends: Call upon loyal creatures of the wild to restore your {buffimg} {vitals}, {buffimg} {dopamine}, and {buffimg} {endurance}. Their bond refreshes the soul.
Nature.Rain: Summons a heavy rain to soak enemies with {debuffimg} {water}, washing away heat and disrupting focus with nature’s downpour.
Nature.Protective Roots: Ancient roots rise to shield and heal, granting {buffimg} {vitals} and {buffimg} {endurance} to the caster. A living fortress of bark and will.
Nature.Aggressive Grass: Sharp-bladed grass surges underfoot, striking enemies with {debuffimg} {poison} and a spark of {debuffimg} {lightning}. What once cushioned now cuts.
Nature.Earth Strength: Tap into the unshakable core of the planet, gaining {buffimg} {rage} and standing unyielding in the face of chaos.
Nature.Healing Touch: A soothing palm radiates gentle energy, replenishing {buffimg} {vitals} and {buffimg} {endurance}. Nature’s embrace cures all.

Aura.Awakening: Unleashes an empowering surge that grants allies {buffimg} {vamp}, {buffimg} {wisdom}, {buffimg} {dopamine}, {buffimg} {endurance}, {buffimg} {rage}, and {buffimg} {immune} to negative effects. This wave of energy uplifts the entire party, inspiring resilience and mental clarity in the heat of battle.
Aura.Dark Energy: Emits a malevolent aura that afflicts enemies with {debuffimg} {dark magic}, {debuffimg} {poison}, {debuffimg} {water}, {debuffimg} {lightning}, and {debuffimg} {curse}. The atmosphere thickens with dread, causing foes to falter under the oppressive force.
Aura.From Heaven: Blesses allies with {buffimg} {barrier}, {buffimg} {vamp}, {buffimg} {vitals}, and {buffimg} {wisdom} — a divine touch of protection and knowledge. Light rains down like grace, shielding all who bask within from harm and confusion.
Aura.Deadliest Feeling: Wraps allies in a dark aura granting {buffimg} {vamp} and {buffimg} {rage}, while poisoning enemies with {debuffimg} {poison}. This aura feeds off fear, amplifying your damage and crippling enemy resolve.
Aura.Ethernal Eyes: Reveals hidden truths with an aura that empowers with {buffimg} {lightning} and weakens foes with {debuffimg} {dark magic}, {debuffimg} {wisdom}, and {debuffimg} {curse}. Allies gain foresight and power, while enemies find their minds clouded and strength drained.
Aura.Shadow Aura: A haunting presence that spreads {debuffimg} {dark magic}, {debuffimg} {water}, and {debuffimg} {curse} to nearby foes. The very air feels cursed, dragging all who enter into a chilling oblivion.
Aura.Firefull Feeling: A blazing aura surrounds you, searing enemies with {debuffimg} {lightning} and {debuffimg} {fire}. Flames dance with electricity as this aura radiates destructive energy to incinerate all threats.
Aura.Frozen Possession: A chilling aura inflicts {debuffimg} {water}, {debuffimg} {lightning}, and {debuffimg} {ice} upon nearby foes. Cold grips their souls, slowing movement and freezing the will to fight.
Aura.Manipulative Chakra: Twists the air with deceitful energy, bestowing {buffimg} {barrier} while afflicting enemies with {debuffimg} {dark magic} and {debuffimg} {curse}. This chakra distorts intentions, turning friend to foe in the minds of the weak.
Aura.Lightning Orb: Crackles with electrical energy, radiating {debuffimg} {fire} and {debuffimg} {lightning} to those who draw near. The static charge stuns and singes, disrupting formations and scorching armor alike.
Aura.The Presence: An overwhelming aura grants {buffimg} {rage} and curses enemies with {debuffimg} {dark magic} and {debuffimg} {curse}. Just standing nearby fuels allies with fury while invoking dread in the hearts of opponents.
Aura.Calm Mind: Induces inner peace, restoring {buffimg} {vitals}, {buffimg} {endurance}, {buffimg} {dopamine}, and {buffimg} {wisdom}. This serenity enhances focus, clarity, and emotional resilience in the chaos of battle.
Aura.Cleanse: Purifies the soul with {buffimg} {immune}, {buffimg} {wisdom}, and {buffimg} {vitals}. Negative energy is washed away, allowing inner strength to shine and pushing back impending harm.
Aura.Fatigue: Radiates weakness, draining enemies with {debuffimg} {fire}, {debuffimg} {ice}, {debuffimg} {poison}, {debuffimg} {water}, {debuffimg} {curse}, and {debuffimg} {dark magic}. Their stamina fades as ailments take root and resistance crumbles.
Aura.Focus: A serene aura enhances mental clarity, granting {buffimg} {dopamine}, {buffimg} {rage}, and {buffimg} {wisdom}. It sharpens instincts and bolsters determination, forging an unshakable resolve.
Aura.Light Shield: Protective light surrounds the caster, offering {buffimg} {barrier} and {buffimg} {endurance}. It radiates with calming energy, shielding from harm and reinforcing the spirit under pressure.
Aura.Mystery: An eerie glow that silently infects foes with {debuffimg} {curse} and {debuffimg} {dark magic}. Its source is unknown, and its presence is felt long after the light fades.
Aura.Spiritual Glow: A faint radiance bolsters the soul with {buffimg} {dopamine}, {buffimg} {endurance}, and {buffimg} {wisdom}. This glow invigorates the heart, mind, and body in ways unseen but deeply felt.
